title: Enjoy wireless CarPlay with this 9-inch touchscreen for just $95
description: Here's an easy way to enjoy Apple CarPlay or Android Auto even if your car is a little dated. Add an affordable aftermarket CarPlay display. (via Cult of Mac - Apple news, rumors, reviews and how-tos)
author: Cult of Mac Deals
excerpt: Here's an easy way to enjoy Apple CarPlay or Android Auto even if your car is a little dated. Add an affordable aftermarket CarPlay display.
text: Daily deals Install this 9-inch wireless touchscreen with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto at a very affordable price. Photo: Cult of Mac Deals Built-in car touchscreens that work with Apple CarPlay or Android Auto come standard in most modern cars, but there’s an easy way to enjoy the benefits even if your car is a little dated. Simply add an affordable aftermarket CarPlay display. With this 9-inch wireless car display, you can enjoy safer accessibility to your smartphone while driving. For a limited time, it’s on sale for only $94.97 (regularly $179). Aftermarket CarPlay display (works with Android Auto, too) This unit comes with two different suction cup mounting rigs that allow users to place it anywhere they want on either the dash or windshield. It can be powered through a basic cigarette lighter, which makes it universally compatible with basically every car on the road. And you can quickly pair it to your smartphone to access CarPlay or Android Auto features. Once paired, you can mirror your smartphone’s display onto the CarPlay touchscreen. You’ll gain access to all your relevant apps, including navigation, music, etc., by touch or voice command (via Siri or Google Assistant). Then you’ll enjoy real-time GPS navigation during long road trips and hands-free control of your playlists, texts, calls and much more. The 1024×600 FHD renders everything clearly. There’s also a 64GB TF card in case you want to play movies or videos saved on storage. It can even support a backup camera to automatically display when you put your car in reverse, as long as your current vehicle already has a rearview camera. Save on an affordable CarPlay touchscreen You can always try rolling your own DIY CarPlay upgrade. But an aftermarket CarPlay display is an easier option. (Cult of Mac Deals also sells 7-inch, 10-inch and folding CarPlay displays at various price points.) Upgrade your driving experience and safety with this 9-inch wireless display with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto compatibility. It costs just $94.97 for a limited time — a 47% discount off the list price of $179.99. Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackSocial, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackSocial directly. We originally published this post on the 9-inch CarPlay display on February 14, 2024. We updated the pricing.
html:
• Daily deals

Built-in car touchscreens that work with Apple CarPlay or Android Auto come standard in most modern cars, but there’s an easy way to enjoy the benefits even if your car is a little dated. Simply add an affordable aftermarket CarPlay display.

With this 9-inch wireless car display, you can enjoy safer accessibility to your smartphone while driving. For a limited time, it’s on sale for only $94.97 (regularly $179).

Aftermarket CarPlay display (works with Android Auto, too)

This unit comes with two different suction cup mounting rigs that allow users to place it anywhere they want on either the dash or windshield. It can be powered through a basic cigarette lighter, which makes it universally compatible with basically every car on the road. And you can quickly pair it to your smartphone to access CarPlay or Android Auto features.

Once paired, you can mirror your smartphone’s display onto the CarPlay touchscreen. You’ll gain access to all your relevant apps, including navigation, music, etc., by touch or voice command (via Siri or Google Assistant). Then you’ll enjoy real-time GPS navigation during long road trips and hands-free control of your playlists, texts, calls and much more.

The 1024×600 FHD renders everything clearly. There’s also a 64GB TF card in case you want to play movies or videos saved on storage. It can even support a backup camera to automatically display when you put your car in reverse, as long as your current vehicle already has a rearview camera.

Save on an affordable CarPlay touchscreen

You can always try rolling your own DIY CarPlay upgrade. But an aftermarket CarPlay display is an easier option. (Cult of Mac Deals also sells 7-inch, 10-inch and folding CarPlay displays at various price points.)

Upgrade your driving experience and safety with this 9-inch wireless display with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto compatibility. It costs just $94.97 for a limited time — a 47% discount off the list price of $179.99.

Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals

Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackSocial, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackSocial directly. We originally published this post on the 9-inch CarPlay display on February 14, 2024. We updated the pricing.
